Northern Sotho: Naga ya Ellsworth ke selete sa borwa bja Peninsula, e tlemilwe ke Noka ya Belingshausen. 
English: Ellsworth Land is the southern part of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.

text: South Pole Traverse (goba Highway) e šaletše morago ga 1600 km go tšwa Setišing sa McMurdo go la Ross Sea go ya Pole.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: South Pole Traverse (goba Highway) e šaletše morago ga 1600 km go tšwa Setišing sa McMurdo go la Ross Sea go ya Pole. 
English: South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station in the Ross Sea to the Pole.

text: Bokagodimo bja ka godimo bja mafelelo a leboa la Machu Picchu ke thaba ya go rotoga, gantši ke bomorago bja diswantšho tše dintši tša mašope a.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Bokagodimo bja ka godimo bja mafelelo a leboa la Machu Picchu ke thaba ya go rotoga, gantši ke bomorago bja diswantšho tše dintši tša mašope a. 
English: Northern end of Machu Picchu: The top of the mountain is the famous mountain, often the backdrop of many photos of Machu Picchu.

text: Enceladus ke sedirišwa sa go bonala kudu lenaneong la sola, le bontšha dipersente tše 90 tša mahlasedi a letšatši leo le se e fihlelago.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Enceladus ke sedirišwa sa go bonala kudu lenaneong la sola, le bontšha dipersente tše 90 tša mahlasedi a letšatši leo le se e fihlelago. 
English: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.

text: Ga go se se ka bonwago ntle le lefaufau la go hlaka, le lebotse godimo le dithaba tše dintši tšeo di dikologago. Bonnyane bja lefase le bo ka bonwa goba bja kwewa ka gare ga lewa.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Ga go se se ka bonwago ntle le lefaufau la go hlaka, le lebotse godimo le dithaba tše dintši tšeo di dikologago. Bonnyane bja lefase le bo ka bonwa goba bja kwewa ka gare ga lewa. 
English: The Northern Sotho is not visible without a telescope, and can be seen from many mountain tops. Very little of the Earth can be seen or heard from here.

text: Gabjale go Japan. Japan e be ele naga ya sehlakahlake, bjalo ka Britain.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Gabjale go Japan. Japan e be ele naga ya sehlakahlake, bjalo ka Britain. 
English: Now to Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.

text: Ka tlhoro ye, Ledimo la Matlakadibe Gonu, le theilwe ka mokotla wa matlakala a mopalema ka leleme la ba Maldive, le fihlelela meboya ya dikilomitara tše 240 ka iri (di mile tše 149 ka iri) .
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Ka tlhoro ye, Ledimo la Matlakadibe Gonu, le theilwe ka mokotla wa matlakala a mopalema ka leleme la ba Maldive, le fihlelela meboya ya dikilomitara tše 240 ka iri (di mile tše 149 ka iri). 
English: The storm, named Gonu, was formed from a collection of remnants from the tropical depression Gonu, which was named in the Maldives in the early hours of Monday.

text: Lefelo la Turkey, go akaretša matsha, di tšea bobedi bja dikilomitara tše 783,562 (300,948 sq mi), yeo e lego gore bobedi bja dikilomitara tše 755,688 (291,773 sq mi) di go borwa bodikela bja Asia gomme bobedi bja dikilomitara tše 23,764 (9,174 sq mi) di Yuropa.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Lefelo la Turkey, go akaretša matsha, di tšea bobedi bja dikilomitara tše 783,562 (300,948 sq mi), yeo e lego gore bobedi bja dikilomitara tše 755,688 (291,773 sq mi) di go borwa bodikela bja Asia gomme bobedi bja dikilomitara tše 23,764 (9,174 sq mi) di Yuropa. 
English: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in the south-western Asia and 23,764 kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.

text: Dihlakahlaka tša Borwa bja Shetland, dihweditšwego ka 1819, dinaga tše mmalwa di re ke tša tšona ebile di na le metheo ye mentši, ke tše lesometshela tšeo di bego gona ka 2020.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Dihlakahlaka tša Borwa bja Shetland, dihweditšwego ka 1819, dinaga tše mmalwa di re ke tša tšona ebile di na le metheo ye mentši, ke tše lesometshela tšeo di bego gona ka 2020. 
English: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.

text: Apia ke toropokgolo ya Samoa. Toropo yeo e sehlakahlakeng sa Upolu gomme se na le batho ba ka fase ga 40,000.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Apia ke toropokgolo ya Samoa. Toropo yeo e sehlakahlakeng sa Upolu gomme se na le batho ba ka fase ga 40,000. 
English: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The city is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.

text: Bjale ka ge ledimo le le kgole le go wela fase, go dula go le thata go lekola tshenyo ye e ka bago gona go United States goba Caribbean.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Bjale ka ge ledimo le le kgole le go wela fase, go dula go le thata go lekola tshenyo ye e ka bago gona go United States goba Caribbean. 
English: As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

text: Ke ye sese kudu ka fase ga maria gomme ye kotwana ka fase ga meboto.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Ke ye sese kudu ka fase ga maria gomme ye kotwana ka fase ga meboto. 
English: It is thinner under maria and thicker under highlands.

text: Dithokgwa ga e no ba mehlaka ya di mangrove - di akaretša a mangwe a mafelo a mafelelo a mafelo a boemo bja mašhoka a maaatla ao a kilego a khupetša molala wa Gangetic.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Dithokgwa ga e no ba mehlaka ya di mangrove - di akaretša a mangwe a mafelo a mafelelo a mafelo a boemo bja mašhoka a maaatla ao a kilego a khupetša molala wa Gangetic. 
English: The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though - they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles that once covered the Gangetic plain.

text: Mmepe wa tšitšinyego ya lefase wa ditšhatšhaba wa United States Geological Survey o bontšitše gore ga go ditšitšinyego tša lefase go la Iceland beke pele ga moo.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Mmepe wa tšitšinyego ya lefase wa ditšhatšhaba wa United States Geological Survey o bontšitše gore ga go ditšitšinyego tša lefase go la Iceland beke pele ga moo. 
English: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior.

text: Le ipeile godimo ga ye tee ya ditaba tša leboa la Mecca, lewa le tloga le ipeetše ka thoko le lefase ka moka.
translated_text:
Northern Sotho: Le ipeile godimo ga ye tee ya ditaba tša leboa la Mecca, lewa le tloga le ipeetše ka thoko le lefase ka moka. 
English: It is one of the Seven Wonders of the World, and is the tallest mountain in the world.
